module.name: component_grouping
module.keywords: module, component, grouping, linear, array, interface

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the different ways of grouping assembly components in an assembly. The module functionality supports discrete and fabricated assemblies, and design reuse of complex design elements.

inscope.li: the grouping of components within an assembly and their arrangement in a linear or rectangular pattern with a fixed grid;
the definition of an assembly group component as interface to be accessed on a next higher assembly level.

outscope.li: other kinds of component arrangement patterns.
